Titanrock.name: The Kingdon of Titanrock
Titanrock.ruling_power: House Virell and allied merchant dynasties
Titanrock.known_for: Crimson wine, blood rituals, coastal trade
Titanrock.music_path: Valmere | Hollow Knight OST - City of Tears.mp3
Titanrock.song_name: Hollow Knight OST - City of Tears
Titanrock.custom_details: Valmere’s nobles often wear masks even in private. Blood lineage is more important than gold.
Titanrock.description: Valmere is a coastal nation built on legacy, loyalty, and blood magic. Its misty shores are lined with castles and vineyards, and its politics are steeped in secrecy.
Titanrock.history: Formed after the collapse of the Empire of Dross. Valmere was born from a blood pact between warring houses, sealed at the Crimson Summit.
Titanrock.culture: Deeply ritualistic and secretive. Art and fashion favor the dramatic, with emphasis on bloodlines, symbolism, and illusion.
Titanrock.politics: Officially an oligarchy, but power shifts frequently among the great houses. Espionage and intrigue are constant.
Titanrock.relationships: Friendly with Caelthas, rival to the Holy Empire of Dross, and trades with the floating markets of Myrr.
Titanrock.geography: Coastal cliffs, crimson rivers, and fog-choked hills. The land is fertile but eerie.
Titanrock.notes: Valmere’s coinage is soaked in blood during minting as part of a protective charm.
